name: Fighters Blast
description:
Aliens, heroes, a tengu demon, short story and multiplayer mode in story mode and versus mode.

Controls:

For the player one is the directional and:

I:  Punch (with the directionals change the type of punch)

O:  Special

K: Recover

L:  More velocity

For the player two is the directional ASWD and:

R:  Punch (with the directionals change the type of punch) and pressing it you can join in the story mode

T:  Special

F: Recover

G:  More velocity

The controls can change clicking is the buton P1 or P2 in the main menu.
